entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of followers of Voldemort, mentioned in the context of their leader's punishment.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: One of Voldemort's followers who has paid some of his debt and is being punished by Voldemort.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The leader of the Death Eaters, punishing one of his followers.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort's title, used to refer to him with respect or fear.

relationships.description: Voldemort is punishing Wormtail for his past actions.
Wormtail helped Voldemort return to his body, and as a result, Voldemort rewards him.
